thank you. good article...sent it along to a couple relatives. :)

-------Original Message-------

From: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Date: Sunday, April 27, 2003 20:57:04
To: Unschooling
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Getting Out of the Way - The Natural Child
Project

I read this article this evening and wanted to pass it along because the
author addresses praising children and also watching our children unfold
freely without us meddling and getting in their way. :)
http://naturalchild.org/naomi_aldort/getting_out.html

TreeGoddess
